identified_risks.risk_description: Limited cloud expertise within the current IT team
identified_risks.response_actions: Accelerate AWS training for key team members, extend cloud architect contract, and implement knowledge transfer sessions from experienced to inexperienced staff
Implement data replication solution, conduct multiple practice migrations, develop detailed rollback plan, and schedule migration during lowest usage period

identified_risks.risk_description: Cloud architect only available for 4 months of 6-month project
identified_risks.response_actions: Front-load architectural decisions, create detailed documentation, implement knowledge transfer plan, and identify backup resources for final 2 months

identified_risks.risk_description: Legacy applications incompatible with cloud environment
identified_risks.response_actions: Conduct early compatibility testing, identify refactoring needs, prepare containerization strategy, and allocate additional development resources if needed

identified_risks.risk_description: Business analyst leaving company during critical project phase
identified_risks.response_actions: Accelerate knowledge transfer, complete critical BA tasks before departure, document all requirements thoroughly, and identify internal resource to assume responsibilities

identified_risks.risk_description: Regulatory compliance requirements not met in cloud environment
identified_risks.response_actions: Engage compliance officer early, document all regulatory requirements, implement AWS compliance tools, and conduct pre-migration compliance audit
Implement aggressive schedule monitoring, identify schedule optimization opportunities, prepare contingency plans for critical path activities, and add buffer to high-risk tasks

identified_risks.risk_description: Integration with third-party financial services fails
identified_risks.response_actions: Engage third-party vendors early, conduct integration testing in phases, develop detailed integration specifications, and prepare fallback options
Escalate to executive sponsor, establish interim agreement for development environments, prepare alternative cloud provider assessment, and develop contract contingency plan
Implement strict cost controls, prioritize expenditures, identify cost-saving opportunities, monitor AWS resource usage closely, and establish approval process for unplanned expenses

identified_risks.risk_description: Security requirements not properly implemented in cloud environment
identified_risks.response_actions: Engage security officer throughout project, implement AWS security best practices, conduct security testing at each phase, and perform third-party security audit

identified_risks.risk_description: Insufficient testing time leads to undetected issues
identified_risks.response_actions: Implement continuous testing throughout project, automate testing where possible, prioritize critical functionality testing, and develop comprehensive test scenarios early
